item.title: Beogram 4000: Repair of a Cracked Plexiglass Hood With Laser Cut Patches
item.description:
The hinge area is the most delicate part of plexiglass hoods found on Beogram turntables. It’s subject to significant stress when opened and closed, while the presence of screw holes for the metal hinge makes it structurally vulnerable. I recently worked on a Beogram 4000 with a cracked hood and a broken-off piece. Inspired by a previous restoration of a Beogram 3000 hinge, I aimed to create a similar solution for the 4000/4002 models...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-repair-of-a-cracked-plexiglass-hood-with-laser-cut-patches/
